business_details.Business: Case record is received on transfer. Perused the previous orders passed by the learned Special Judge, Dhubri.

Accused Hafizur Rahman is produced before me from jail hajot. He is remanded to judicial custody till 16-12-19.Witness Rukshana Khatun has prayed for another date for her deposition vide petition No. 1059/19.Heard and allowed. Seen the petition No. 993/19 filed by the learned counsel of the accused praying for releasing the accused person on bail. This petition will be considered only after examination of the informant and the victim of this case.Issue summon to the informant Maleka Bibi and victim Rukshana Khatun.

Accused Hafizur Rahman is produced before me from jail hajot. He is remanded to judicial custody till 30-12-2019. Two witnesses (PW- 1 and PW-2) are present. They are examined, cross examined and discharged. Issue summons to the witnesses.

Case record is put up before me today as the P.O. is on leave. Accused person is produced before mefrom jail hajot. He is remanded to judicial custody till 10.01.19.No witness is present.Issue summons to the witnesses.
